definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To repeat aloud (some passage , poem or other text previously memorized , or in front of one's eyes), often before an audience .
examples: Janice is able to recite pi to 100 decimals.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To list or enumerate something.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To repeat aloud (some passage , poem or other text previously memorized , or in front of one's eyes), often before an audience .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To list or enumerate something.

definitions.definition: Alternative spelling of re-cite ( which is the preferred spelling, to avoid needless homography ) .

main_definition: Alternative spelling of re-cite ( which is the preferred spelling, to avoid needless homography ) .
